nasa_langley1937511099902865829.content: A one-of-a-kind NASA instrument, called Arcstone, successfully launched to improve the quality of data from Earth-viewing sensors in orbit. The mission will measure sunlight reflected from the Moon— also called lunar spectral reflectance: dir="ltr" href="https://t.co/SZqOxoXdye" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow" target="_blank" role="link" style="color: rgb(29, 155, 240);">go.nasa.gov/44vbEKE
nasa_langley1937511099902865829.author: nasa_langley

nasa_langley1869114051588165850.content: Today, we're holding space. 121 years ago today, the Wright Brothers paved the way for NASA to defy gravity. Whether here on Earth or as we explore other worlds, there's no aerospace without aero. ‍go.nasa.gov/3ZYv3S4
nasa_langley1869114051588165850.author: nasa_langley
